ygData.messageBody:
One very anoying thing what i have seen is that a you are not in
possibility to see active spells on other players or mobs. This creates
serious problem to recast SOW, Armours or other buffs and also can be
interesting to see what buffs have some particular mob.

One solution to this problem can be introduction of new spell "Detect
magic" wich when is active gives possibility to see active spells on other
PC and NPC. It can give on left part of screen same list of spell icons
what you have on right side for spells active on yourself this dont look as
too hard to program and all grafic alredy exist for it.

If there are some possibilitys here can be introdced some variants like
possibility to see only enchantments cast by ourselves or enchantments of
our lv or lower in complexity of spells.

Icons start flashing if they are to vanish as some armours do now but also
for debuffs or root, enstill what you casted on MOB.

Also this can be made so that you can select one of detected spells and
cast a " Dispell magic" only on selected spell !!

This is my little 2 cents in our effort to make a EQ better (its already
best but can alwas make better :-) )
